# mlr3mbo

A new R6 and much more modular implementation for single- and multicrit Bayesian optimization.
We are really not done here! Very prelim code, so beware!

[List of some Ideas](https://github.com/mb706/okmbo/tree/master/todo-files)

```{r example}
library(bbotk)
library(mlr3mbo)

ObjectiveRFun$new(
  fun = function(xs) sum(umlist(xs)^2),
  domain = ParamSet$new(ParamDbl$new("x", -5, 5)),
  id = "test"
)

terminator = trm("evals", n_evals = 20)

instance = OptimInstanceSingleCrit$new(
  objective = obfun, 
  terminator = terminator
)

optimizer = OptimizerMbo$new()
surrogate = SurrogateLearner$new()
surrogate$param_set$param_vals$learner= lrn("regr.km")
proposal_generator = ProposalGeneratorSingle$new()

optimizer$param_set$param_vals$proposal_generator = ProposalGeneratorSingle$new(
  acqfun = AcqFunctionCB$new(surrogate = ),
  )


```
